summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NextRides car marketplace application. Backend API functionality is mostly working (12/13 tests passed) with only minor authentication issue on update listing endpoint. Frontend UI is functional with proper navigation, search, and display features working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Update listing returns 401 authentication error despite valid token
flaky_endpoints.impact: Users cannot edit their existing listings

ui_bugs.issue: Registration form validation shows 'Please fill out this field' for phone field but form can be submitted without filling it
Modal overlay prevents clicking on page elements after registration attempt

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submission doesn't show clear success/failure feedback

passed_tests: Car makes and models API works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix update listing authentication issue in backend API. The PUT /api/listings/{id} endpoint returns 401 even with valid Bearer token. Also improve registration form feedback and modal overlay handling in frontend.
